transcript: we're way better than those guys and I think somebody said like something like that on a meeting and I just thought about it and I was like what a stupid thing to say I was like you gain nothing from that statement what do you gain from that you gain complacency you increase the likely of looking stupid in the case that they do Crush you the only things that upset the guys who are on the top of the mountain is hubus there's really no reason that the guy on the top of the mountain should ever lose he has the most resources he has the highest perspective like he has everything and yet history shows us humans act like humans and so we lose because of our egos and because it hurts to say what if that person's better than me
